attributes.action: Fine MP's who go against the wishes of the majority of their constituents.
attributes.background: MP's are elected to represent the wishes of the majority of their constituents & we are now regularly seeing them do the opposite. If this was happening in any other job that person would be disciplined & eventually be out of a job. MP's seem to think this does not apply to them & it should.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's not the UK Government or Parliament's responsibility to fine MPs for their political views.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/236800
